original:
Richard Winther (1927–2018) was a prominent Danish artist known for his innovative approach to painting and photography. His work has significantly influenced several contemporary artists, including Per Kirkeby and Tal R.

Winther's artistic practice involved a variety of materials, initially utilizing canvas and masonite. In a pursuit to simplify his art, he reduced his color palette and transitioned to painting on cardboard. This shif
